snippet: David Walton has become NBC’s go-to leading man, with a catch: none of the five shows he has starred in have made it past 11 episodes. His current series, “Bent,” awaits its fate.
abstract: Actor David Walton, who stars in the NBC series Bent, has had leading roles in five of the network's shows that were all cancelled after only a few episodes.
lead_paragraph: David Walton has become NBC’s go-to leading man, with a catch: none of the five shows he has starred in have made it past 11 episodes. His current series, “Bent,” awaits its fate.

headline.seo: David Walton’s Latest NBC Show Is ‘Bent’
headline.main: A Man of Many Roles (Most Canceled)
headline.print_headline: A Man of Many Roles (Most Canceled)
